greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of generalized central trinomial coefficients.
comment: Rows sums are A110181. Diagonal sums are A110182. Columns include central trinomial coefficients A002426, A084601, A084603, A084605, A098264. T(n,k) = central coefficient (1 + x + kx^2)^n.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for the first 50 rows, flattened
formula: Number triangle T(n, k) = Sum_{j=0..floor((n-k)/2)} C(n-k, j)*C(n-k-j, j)*k^j.
mathematica: T[n_, 0] := 1; T[n_, k_] := Sum[Binomial[n - k, j]*Binomial[n - k - j, j]*k^j, {j, 0, Floor[(n - k)/2]}]; Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 49}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 05 2017 *)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jul 14 2005
